rows.text_1:
Today we are learning to talk about feelings with our children. 
Noticing  emotions, both our own and our children's, helps us care for ourselves. 
Noticing and talking about feelings with your child helps them learn to express and manage their emotions well - even the difficult ones.
rows.media_title: How will it help me and my family?
rows.media_transcript:
Greetings, everyone.

Does your child ever get really angry or upset, and you don’t know what to do? 

Help your child to manage their emotions better by showing them how to talk about their feelings. It starts with noticing and accepting all emotions – we are all human!
